mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, id as id, password as password, name as name, email as email, tel as tel, phone as phone, birth as birth, gender as gender, authority as authority from user
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, password, name, email, tel, phone, birth, gender, authority, created_date) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{authority}, #{createdDate})
